name: Botania
description: The Game is about a boy that want to achieve his dream to become the GREASTEST Botanist in the world. His Goal will required a Strongest will, He will need to find all the "LEGENDARY FRUIT" inside "The Great Batona" the tree that nourish all life on this planet. But it's not going to be easy, inside there going to be a lot of danger but also the beauty of nature itself. There's are tons of new life form that have never been discovered waiting for you to Explore !
